judges: Before Jones, C. J., Bell, Musmanno, Jones, Cohen, Bok and Eagen, JJ.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Pee Curiam,
The decree of the court below is affirmed; the costs to be paid by the trust estate.
opinions.author: Pee Curiam,

attorneys: Frederick B. Smillie, with him Smillie, Bean, Davis & Tredinnick, for appellant.
Russell J. Brownback, with him Roger B. Reynolds, for appellees.
